Detailed Description

Fonctions that load a universe from a txt and print a given universe in a txt file.

Author:
Julien Delavande
This are fonction to load a universe from a txt file or to print a given universe in a txt file.

The API of the naive_load.h is defined as follows:

  • a function to print the universe in a given file
  • a function to load the universe from a given txt file

Function Documentation

char *  string_file 
)

Load the universe from a given txt file.

Parameters:
p_universe a pointer to the universe to modified with the txt version
string_file the path of the txt to load the universe of
Postcondition:
modified the given universe by implementing the one in txt given file

char *  string_file

Print the universe in a given file.

Parameters:
universe the universe to print in the txt file

Postcondition:
